attributes.action: keep the Post Office and Royal Mail entirely, and completely, in the ownership of the British public and to stop selling, or part-selling Britain to others.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Post Office and Royal Mail work well. They are relied on by people from all over Britain, including rural areas. So please stop selling off, or part-selling off, our British heritage. Very little is now made in Britain so please keep British services.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
